data.title: How Will Crypto Market React to Over $15B in Bitcoin, ETH, XRP Options Expiry?
data.description: Crypto market participants are bracing for the monthly options expiry after a recent rebound in Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP. Traders anticipate massive volatility as the crypto market still remains under ‘extreme fear’ sentiment. BTC price rebounded by more than 10% in a week amid massive buy-the-dip sentiment and a seasonal boost between Thanksgiving and Christmas.
data.keywords: XRP, Bitcoin, options traders, Crypto Market, notional value, max pain
